title: "Jim Heffernan column: What's all this about artificial intelligence?"
excerpt: "“I don’t see no need for artificial intelligence when we — I’m talkin’ men like me who think deep a lot — can figure everything out all by ourselves without using no computers. Can’t help it; we just know stuff. How? I learnt my education out behind the barn. That’s all you need. Put your jeans on before your boots. Hello?"
